overview: Mandali short film tells the story of the daily life of an old man who has struggled for years to reach his mistress. Every day, Mandali receives his only hot meal from the coal mine where he works and places it in front of the woman's house to be a key to her communication to receive a positive response. The days will go by as before until the day comes when Mandali will find himself on the closest possible path to his love as a result of an event.
title: Mandali
